qas.question: what sound emerged in Detroit with the recordings of juan atkins and derrick may?

plausible_answers.text: Ten City Byron Burke, Byron Stingily & Herb Lawson(from "intensity")

qas.question: What group did Devin Saunderson form?
What sound emerged in Detroit with the recordings of Juan May and Derrick Atkins?
What sound did US house music move beyond in the late 70s?

context: In the U.S., the music was being developed to create a more sophisticated sound,[citation needed] moving beyond just <a4_0><b9_0>drum loops and short samples<b9_0/><a4_0/>. In <a3_0><b8_0>Chicago<b8_0/><a3_0/>, Marshall Jefferson had formed the house group <a0_0><b5_0>Ten City Byron Burke, Byron Stingily & Herb Lawson(from "intensity")<b5_0/><a0_0/>. <a2_0><b7_0>New York<b7_0/><a2_0/>–based performers such as Mateo & Matos and Blaze had slickly produced disco house tracks. In Detroit a <a1_0><b6_0>proto-techno music sound<b6_0/><a1_0/> began to emerge with the recordings of Juan Atkins, Derrick May and Kevin Saunderson.
